<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>时间代码</title>
    <style>

        html,
        body {
            height: 100%;
            background-color: black; 
        }
        svg {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
        }

        .word {
            font-size: 22vh;
            font-weight: bold;
            fill: none;
            stroke-width: 8px;
            stroke-dasharray: 70, 230;
            animation: myAnimation 8s linear infinite;
        }

        .word-1 {
            stroke: #ff4100;
            text-shadow: 0 0 50px #ff4100;
            animation-delay: -2s;
        }
        .word-2 {
            stroke: #ff7f00;
            text-shadow: 0 0 50px #ff7f00;
            animation-delay: -4s;
        }

        .word-3 {
            stroke: #04189e;
            text-shadow: 0 0 50px #04189e;
            animation-delay: -6s;
        }
        .word-4 {
            stroke: #00b25c;
            text-shadow: 0 0 50px #00b25c;
            animation-delay: -8s;
        }
        @keyframes myAnimation {
            to {
                stroke-dashoffset: 400;
            }
        }

    </style>
</head>

<body>
    <svg>
        <text id="time" text-anchor="middle" x="50%" y="50%" class="word word-1"></text>
        <text id="time" text-anchor="middle" x="50%" y="50%" class="word word-2"></text>
        <text id="time" text-anchor="middle" x="50%" y="50%" class="word word-3"></text>
        <text id="time" text-anchor="middle" x="50%" y="50%" class="word word-4"></text>
    </svg>
    <script>
        function getTime() {
            var nowTime = new Date();
            var h = nowTime.getHours();
            var m = nowTime.getMinutes();
            var s = nowTime.getSeconds();

            function checktime(x) {
                if (x < 10) {
                    x = '0' + x
                }
                return x
            }
            h = checktime(h)
            m = checktime(m)
            s = checktime(s)
            return `${h} : ${m} : ${s}`
        }
       
        var times = document.querySelectorAll('text');
        setInterval(() => {
            var nowTimer = getTime();
            times.forEach((item, i) => {
                item.innerHTML = nowTimer
            })
        }, 1000)
        // TODO requestAnimationFrame
    </script>
</body>

</html>
